website_summaries.verdict: A low-tech, low-price baby food mill that works best for softer options for younger babies.
pros: Easily mashes cooked foods or soft fruit into puree
Non-slip grip, base and turning handle for ease of use
cons: Works best on extremely soft foods
Meats and harder vegetables may not process well

customer_reviews.title: NOPE - DON'T BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Weak connection between handle and blade that flexes under any load. The tiny, thin blade that is loose and won't actually cut food of any substance (meat, etc.). This is pretty much useless unless you are trying to mash foods that are already heavily cooked and mushy, to begin with. Don't waste your money on this overpriced product. I purchased thinking that OXO wouldn't make a junk product. Sadly, I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: DJL

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless
customer_reviews.text: I first attempted to use this when my granddaughter was just 6 months old, but the texture of the food was too coarse so I put it away for a while. Just brought it out again now that she's 11 months old. It seems as if the blades are just not sharp enough, as I had a difficult time even with peas. I'm baffled at some reviews that indicate it works well. That's not my experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The food needs to have specific hardness for this device to work. Too soft or too hard, and it does not work. Take carrots for example. If you make them too soft with steam, this won't work. Of course, it does not work if they are raw either. Too much effort to find the right consistency before using this.
customer_reviews.author: mannyzen

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift from a registry so it hasn't yet been used. I had a similar one with my babies, so I thought it would be a useful gift. I never bought baby food at the store. With a grinder like this, you can serve your own food as long as you watch the seasonings. It's easy to take with you to restaurants, also. It looks like it will be easy to clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GeMaC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My 10 month old still doesn’t have any teeth yet and she’s always interested in what we’re eating for dinner and this has been a life saver. She is able to eat everything we eat and she loves it. If the food is a little thick add a bit of water. It’s easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: SaraArte

customer_reviews.title: PIECE of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This baby food grinder is junk. The design is so bad that you can’t even get the baby food out if It gets puréed ; The first time I used it, it became stained and the stain would not come off. I really don’t think I can say anything good about this product. Not really in a position to ship it back because of corona, but would never buy it again. Cheaply made and certainly not worth the cost. If I could give zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: jazzybelle267

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage
customer_reviews.text: If you try to mash anything more solid than a banana you will pop the plastic casing apart. Also, there are grooves within one of the components that are impossible to clean, and get gunk trapped within. If you only ever plan on feeding your kid bananas and enjoy rolling the dice on a food-borne illness, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rivett

customer_reviews.title: Ok to grind harder food
customer_reviews.text: This will grind meats and fruits however anything with liquid spills out into the counter. There is always food left in the well. I’m not sure how to get the food out properly but I manage. Plastic easily stains but clean up is pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby food maker
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter and her husband, to use for their first child, and they love it. It is simple to use and clean, and makes quick work of all kinds of food. It gives them the opportunity to make food with nothing added that they don't approve of. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Baby Food Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite, the blade is not very sharp and it might take a few uses to get the food to a good consistency for a young baby. I have used other baby grinders that did a much better job. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kat12903

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find this very easy to use. Don’t grind food up they way I thought. Still big chunks present. I try to be positive about reviews but honestly this just sat in my cabinet unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: New parents, do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible grinder. Warning to any new parent looking for a good grinder! This item did not grind even the softest of foods. What is did grind made it more like a gummy paste than a chewable food. I wish that KidCo would bring back their original grinder because it was amazing. We have tried every other brand of these with zero luck. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: neko

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we made. I think bad reviews are bc people dont know how to use it correctly. Place the food in the well then squeeze down as you rotate the blades
customer_reviews.author: einstein

customer_reviews.title: New favorite way to prepare baby food
customer_reviews.text: This is my third baby and I wish I had one of these the first two times!!! So much easier to prepare small amounts of baby food (rather than getting out the food processor). Works great and cleans really well, just be careful when taking out of the dishwasher because the bottom piece will always be full of water.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to make baby food! So Much healthier to use the food you make and know what’s in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Works well with the quality you expect from OXO
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to clean if you rinse well after use then wash in top rack of dishwasher. Somewhat more difficult to clean by hand using a bottle brush.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! Makes it so easy & convenient to let baby eat what we are eating!! Portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: *Very useful! *Works great. *Arrived on time. *Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: MySharona

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Used it all the way through the soft food stages. We would just put our dinner in and grind it up for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Esselbach

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This didnt chop any of the foods I wanted to chop. And i only used it twice and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and was too pricey not worth it very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: MommyMegan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money. Easier to use and clean than electric alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: We tried a few fancy electric mashers/mills, but this one proved the easiest to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in NH

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Get one. Instantly turn any family dinner into baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney T Norris

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift or item to have for your baby
customer_reviews.text: Love this easy to take anywhere and you know exactly what baby is eating no extra chemicals
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Feeding Therapist Approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pediatric feeding therapist and this is one of my favorite products. I recommend this to everyone starting at 8 months. It works really well compared to the other brands. This allows infants to explore more flavor and nutrition of foods that that rest of the family is eating while keeping the texture manageable and safe. Babies can also work on self feeding skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OXO Tot Mash Maker Baby Food Mill, Teal
product_meta.description: Color:TealTurn any grown-up food into baby food in seconds with the OXO Tot Mash Maker Baby Food Mill. Easily scoop or serve pureed food from it.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel blade and grinding plate purees soft or cooked fruits and vegetables into baby food with ease
Easily scoop or serve pureed food from top
Contoured body and non-slip grip for comfortable use
Non-skid base provides stability while milling
Allows for adding liquid to control puree thickness

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
